member.name: T:Cirreum.Communications.Email.Configuration.AzureEmailBulkSettings

member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum number of concurrent email operations. This controls how many emails can be sent in parallel. Valid range: 1-100.
member.value: The maximum concurrency level. Defaults to 10.

member.name: F:Cirreum.Communications.Email.Configuration.AzureEmailBulkSettings._maxBatchSize
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum batch size for bulk operations. Since Azure doesn't have a native batch API, this controls how many recipients to include in a single email when using shared template mode. Valid range: 1-50 (Azure limit).
member.value: The maximum batch size. Defaults to 50.

member.name: P:Cirreum.Communications.Email.Configuration.AzureEmailBulkSettings.BatchDelay
member.summary: Gets or sets the delay between batches to avoid rate limiting. Useful when sending large volumes to respect Azure's rate limits.
member.value: The delay between batches. Defaults to 100 milliseconds.

member.name: P:Cirreum.Communications.Email.Configuration.AzureEmailBulkSettings.WaitForCompletion
member.summary: Gets or sets whether to wait for operation completion in bulk sends. When true, each email operation will be polled until completion. When false, operations are initiated but not tracked.
member.value: Whether to wait for completion. Defaults to false for better performance.

member.name: P:Cirreum.Communications.Email.Configuration.AzureEmailBulkSettings.OperationTimeout
member.summary: Gets or sets the maximum time to wait for an individual operation to complete when WaitForCompletion is true.
member.value: The operation timeout. Defaults to 2 minutes.
